As a mage, Frieren is good at manipulating #yMana, so gain of #yMana and the flow them is the key to win. Your #yMana amount will show on the panel, if you have #yChanted this turn, its edge will become yellow.
#yChant #ycards need to exhaust enough #yMana to be played, you can choose one of three piles which has enough #yMana when you #yChant.

Card rewards will randomly drop #yMagic Factor and Props. Only by loading 3 #yFactors in 3 pile slots can you #yChant and trigger the Factor's effect, Magic Prop can be used to exchange Factors, create Factors and so on.
Add a #yMagic_Factor or #yMagic_Prop to your Magic Deck
Choose a Magic Factor or Magic Prop
A special kind of option card which can be loaded in #ySlot .It can be activated when you're #ychanting and there's enough #yMana in the pile corresponding to the #gLoading #ySlot .
A disposable card. Start or stop using by #rRight_Click itself in #yMagic_Deck .
